article_title: Laid Off At 60? How To Plan For An Unplanned Retirement

article_metadata.description: Gains in longevity over the last few decades have a lot of us saying that “70 is the new 50.” But even though most of us like to think we have some control over how long we’ll work, life has a way of throwing a curveball sometimes.
article_metadata.author: Northwestern Mutual
